name: Reminiscence: Synesthesia
description:
It has only been less than a year since the death of his parents but Anthony returned to his childhood home at the behest of his eldest brother. He wasn’t sure whether to sell the house or keep it and sought Anthony’s opinion. As Anthony was taking a quick rest in what was his old room, memories came flooding back to him.  

Reminiscence: Synesthesia is a narrative storytelling game where you take control of Anthony and explore his old room in his family house. Each item you manage to inspect will show you a slice of the his past. As you uncover more of his memories, Anthony will begin to realize what home really means to him.
